mapper.update: /* updateToken */ UPDATE app_enterprise_user SET token = #{token} WHERE id = #{ID}
mapper.select: /* queryUserList */ SELECT enterprise_user_key, id, name, auth FROM app_enterprise_user WHERE enterprise_key = #{enterpriseKey} AND auth IN ('AU02', 'AU03') ORDER BY auth ASC, name ASC
